products.title: Mood Fr Voile Cotton White Roller Blind
products.description: Their mood voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Mood fr voile cotton white is a semi-translucent stylish, light white roller and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in this modern white shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant coating makes this sheer roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.title: Thermoblock Blackout White Roller Blind
products.description: Their exclusive thermoblock range combines blackout and thermal properties in a range of soft neutral colours. A white roller blind easily freshens up the space. Their thermoblock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. This white blackout roller also features a silver uv-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter, which means this roller is also great for hot offices or sunrooms.

products.description: The genesis blackout luxe white roller blind with its crisp white colour and simple design is a breath of fresh air for any space. The attractive, natural weave effect fabric is backed with a colour match blackout coating and can be lowered via the smooth rolling function to give optimum privacy and shade in an easy movement. products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Vanilla - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout vanilla allows you to add that subtle and refined touch of style to your home that it can be so hard to pin down. It's a gentle blend of cream and beige that sits elegantly in the background, giving your other colours the freedom to come to the fore and catch the eye. If you want to add something elegant and understated to the master bedroom then try combining vanilla with a matching rug atop a laminate floor.

products.title: Ecowood, Brilliant White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a timeless look and feel, brilliant white satin from their ever-popular ecowood range offers you a chance to breathe new life into any space. The crisp tone of the white shines through in the background - adding the perfect finishing touch to the contemporary look you've carefully created. We love the idea of pairing brilliant white with crisp white fabrics and light stone grey scatter cushions in the master bedroom.

products.title: Ecowood, Washed White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: A subtly layered finish creates the standout look that we call washed white satin. The washed out white provides the ideal canvas for the gentle ebb and flow of the grain that comes through the closer you look. For a relaxing ambience that will have you drifting off to sleep in no time at all why not pair washed white with some gentle blue walls and a lightly coloured wooden floor? Ideal for taking you back to memories of the coast as you fall into the deepest sleep the moment your head hits the pillow.

products.title: Ecowood, Absolute White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: With realistic woodgrain texturing for an authentic feel, the ecowood in absolute white fine grain displays an icy white tone and a matt finish. Alongside thick, sturdy slats, this blind features a matching headrail, pelmet, and bottom rail for a classy, finished look. For a bright and breezy bathroom look, where the water-resistant absolute white fine grain will settle in perfectly, post the blind against clean aqua walls.

products.title: Ecowood, Brilliant White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Brilliant white fine grain combines a calm and pure white with an intriguing texture which adds depth and subtly to any room in the house. As the light catches your eye you'll see how the textured lines gently ebb and flow to give the piece a unique look and feel. Finding the perfect finishing touch for the spare bedroom can be difficult, so why not go in a different direction? The neutral colouring works in any setting, whilst the natural flow of the lines adds a calming presence that will have your guests drifting off to sleep in no time at all.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), White - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout white is a roller blind that allows you to drift off into a deep sleep the moment your head hits the pillow. With a light and breezy design that's easy on the eye, and crafted with care from their signature blackout fabric, it's everything you need to create your own little oasis of calm. Matching trinity white with neutral walls and light stained floors is an inspired choice if you want to create a bedroom that you can rest and relax in before bedtime.

products.title: Splash Snow White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Splash snow vertical blinds provide a beautiful and fresh finish when dressing windows. It is an attractive bright white colour. The splash snow fabric is also moisture resistent making them perfect for kitchens and bathrooms. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. As this is one of their made to measure products, a 5 year guarantee is also included when purchasing this blind, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time.

This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this white vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Burst Snowfall Roller Blind
products.description: Cool and crisp, the splash frost is like a clear winter's morning without a cloud in the sky. The true beauty of this slightly thinner dimout blind is that in direct sunlight it will glow with a gentle intensity that soothes the soul and gives the entire room a slightly heavenly vibe. Perfect for neutral tone bedrooms, when the sun rises and illuminates the fabric you will wake up feeling at peace and to the sound of harps.

products.title: Burst White Lotus Roller Blind
products.description: Add some serenity to your home with the pure white of the burst white lotus roller blind. This blind will gently filter the light entering through your window, helpfully stopping any glare pestering you whilst you try to watch tv. These blinds are a dimout material so will gently filter the light making them ideal for living rooms, kitchens and bathrooms. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric.
